description: This file contains the core game logic for a 2048 puzzle game implementation, including move handling, tile merging, spawning new tiles, and determining game state conditions.

classes.name: GameLogic
classes.description: Class providing static methods to handle the game's core logic such as creating new games, making moves, and resolving merges.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Initializes a new game board with two spawned tiles.

methods.name: move
methods.description: Performs a move in a specified direction, updates the game state, and handles tile merging and spawning.
